# Git Learning Course

This is a comprehensive Git learning course with lessons covering all essential Git concepts.

## Project Structure
- README.md - Course overview and navigation
- lesson-01-introduction.md - Git basics and concepts
- lesson-02-basic-commands.md - Essential Git commands
- lesson-03-branching.md - Branching and merging
- lesson-04-remotes.md - Working with remote repositories
- lesson-05-best-practices.md - Best practices and tips
- cheat-sheet.md - Quick reference guide
